descriptionHtml:
= What does it do? =
This mod changes almost all the smelting recipes. Most of the changes are alterations to the amount of ore needed to craft ingots, but one addition is a recipe that lets you melt down iron and corundum ingots to make steel.

It also quite heftily changes the amount of ingots you get from melting down Dwemer scrap, with the biggest change being Solid Dwemer metal now producing a staggering 25 ingots!

All of these quantities are based off of the weight of their raw components.

= Why? =
The inconsistensies I perceive in the smelting system have annoyed me from the moment I started playing Skyrim, so I finally decided to do something about it.

= Installation Instructions =
Just drop the included *.esp into your \"Skyrim/Data\" folder and enable it.

= Requirements =
None

= Alterations =
The following ores now only take 1 unit to make an ingot:
*	Corundum
*	Ebony
*	Gold
*	Malachite
*	Moonstone
*	Orichalcum
*	Quicksilver
*	Silver

Steel Ingots from Iron and Corundum ore now needs 2x Iron Ore and 1x Corundum ore to make 3x Steel Ingots.
Steel Ingots can also be made from 2x iron Ingot and 1x Corundum Ingot to make 3x Steel Ingots.

Dwarven Ingots - Reballanced to match item weights.
*	Bent Dwemer Scrap Metal - Was 3 Ingots, Now 2 Ingots
*	Large Dwemer Strut - Was 3 Ingots, Now 20 Ingots
*	Solid Dwemer Metal - Was 5 Ingots, Now 25 Ingots
*	Large Decorative Dwemer Strut - Was 2 Ingots, Now 15 Ingots
*	Large Dwemer Plate Metal - Was 3 Ingots, Now 2 Ingots
*	Small Dwemer Plate Metal - Was 3 Ingots, Now 2 Ingots


= ChangeLog =
30-Jul-2013: Released \'Lite\' version
30-Jul-2013: Updated readme to correct errors
03-Oct-2012: 1.0 - Release
